title: The ringtone doesn't gradually appear on Google Pixel phone
content: Hello. Due to some issues, I have to factory reset my Pixel 4. After restoring factory settings, I downloaded a ringtone and set it as phone ringtone. However there was one problem, ringtones did not gradually appear. Every time a call comes, it just rings with a pretty loud volume. This can be quite annoying in some cases. Here's where I got that ringtone: https://dzwoneknatelefon.com/.So what's the problem?
